title: Some roads and campgrounds closed
description: Several park roads and campgrounds are closed due to flash flooding on 12/24, 1/1 & 1/3. Some open roads have damaged shoulders and debris. Drive with caution. Click "more" and scroll down for detailed information.

title: No Boating on Lake Manly (Badwater Basin)
description: Launching or recovering any type of watercraft is prohibited. No flotation devices, including kayaks, paddleboards, or similar equipment, are permitted anywhere in the park.

title: Gas Pumps at Panamint Springs Resort are Closed at Night
description: Gasoline is available at Panamint Springs Resort from 7am-9:30pm, daily. Gas is available at Furnace Creek and Stovepipe Wells 24hrs.
